propertyGroup.description: Properties for a part or part group
propertyGroup.label: Part Common Properties
propertyGroup.name: part

property.description: The name of the family to which this part or group belongs.
property.name: family

property.description: A comma separated list of asset URIs pointing to data sheets
property.name: dataSheets

property.description: A comma separated list of asset URIs pointing to other documents
property.name: otherDocuments

property.description: A comma separated list of asset URIs pointing to reference manuals
property.name: referenceManuals

property.description: A comma separated list of asset URIs pointing to errata
property.name: errata

property.description: The asset directory containing the part firmware images.
property.name: firmwareDirectory

propertyGroup.description: Part overrides for the hardware database
propertyGroup.name: hardware.part

property.description: Product line of this hardware (e.g. EFR32, EZR32, EM35x, etc.)
property.name: type

property.description: The family code for this part (e.g. M (Mighty), H (Happy), B (Blue), etc.)
property.name: familyType

property.description: If the part has this property set, then this is a wireless part.)
property.name: wirelessPart

property.description: The flash size for this part (e.g. 256K, 512K, etc.) Note that the K (or M) is required since it denotes the real flash size (256K == 256000)
property.name: flash

property.description: The package type for this part.
property.name: package

property.description: The pins for this part.
property.name: pins

property.description: The temperature code for this part.
property.name: temp

property.description: The part series
property.name: series

property.description: The feature set code for this part.
property.name: featureSet

property.description: The device configuration for this part.
property.name: configuration

property.description: Whether this part has usb support or not
property.name: usb

property.description: The performance code for this part.
property.name: performance

property.description: A part descriptor reference for the MCU contained within this part.
property.name: mcu_chip

property.description: A part descriptor reference for the radio chip contained within this part.
property.name: radio_chip

property.description: If the part has this property set, then this is a custom controlled part.
property.name: custom

property.description: Property that specifies the ram size for debugging and flashing.
property.name: memory.RAM.size

property.description: Property that specifies the flash size for debugging and flashing.
property.name: memory.FLASH.size

property.description: A part descriptor reference for the secure MCU.
property.name: secure.element

property.description: Debug access point index of core on multi-core device
property.name: ahbap.index

property.description: Property that specifies the flash page size.
property.name: memory.FLASH.pageSize
